definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: We must emphasize basic management pragmatic, no sophistry is allowed and rash.
sentences.chinese: 抓基礎管理一定要強調務實，來不得半點虛假和浮躁。

sentences.english: We are fair, honest, true, and practical , and depend on customers' supporting with growing together.
sentences.chinese: 公平誠信，求真務實，與客戶相扶相依，共同成長。

sentences.english: Zidong is a very practical man who impressed me by that character in his paintings.
sentences.chinese: 自東是個很務實的人，他的畫給我的印象也是這樣。

sentences.english: But if he is born in spring, he will be less of a braggart.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果他在春天出生，他將是較務實。

sentences.english: Therevolutionary change Deng unleashed at home required a pragmatic pro-Westernforeign policy.
sentences.chinese: 鄧在國內發起的變革需要採取務實的親西方外交政策。

sentences.english: Second, uphold mutual benefit and expand pragmatic cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 堅持互惠互利，拓展務實合作。

sentences.english: FOCAC is an effective mechanism for China-Africa practical cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 論壇是中非開展務實合作的有效機制。

sentences.english: In tackling the crisis, practical cooperation is the effective way.
sentences.chinese: 務實合作是戰勝危機的有效途徑。

sentences.english: Focused and practical cooperation in the field of health should continue to expand.
sentences.chinese: 雙方應繼續重點加強在衛生領域的務實合作。

sentences.english: He wants no members who are just along for the ride in his company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想圖名而不務實的人留在他的公司裏。

sentences.english: The pragmatic bride-to-be initially planned to rent a gown.
sentences.chinese: 務實的小兩口原本打算是去租一套禮服的。

sentences.english: Second, we should deepen cooperation in all areas.
sentences.chinese: 第二，要積極拓展各領域務實合作。

sentences.english: Investment and trade are the anchors of practical cooperation and have much potential to be tapped.
sentences.chinese: 貿易投資是務實合作的壓艙石，具有很大潛力。

sentences.english: Secondly, on the basis of complementary advantages to promote pragmatic cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 第二，在優勢互補的基礎上推動務實合作。

sentences.english: This is to be the work of the Pragmatic Sanction of Bourges.
sentences.chinese: 這將是工作的務實的布爾制裁。

sentences.english: We hope to strengthen effective cooperation with Afghanistan in this framework.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望與阿富汗在這一框架中加強務實合作。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
